mapper.select: SELECT gpp.platform_en_name as platformEnName, gpp.platform_cn_name as platformCnName, gc.game_name as categoryName, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT gt.user_id) FROM game_txns gt WHERE gt.platform=gpp.platform_code AND DATE_FORMAT(gt.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')>=#{dto.beginTime} AND DATE_FORMAT(gt.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')<=#{dto.endTime} ) as gamePeopleNum, (SELECT SUM(gt.bet_amount) FROM game_txns gt WHERE gt.platform=gpp.platform_code AND DATE_FORMAT(gt.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')>=#{dto.beginTime} AND DATE_FORMAT(gt.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')<=#{dto.endTime} ) as betAmount, (SELECT SUM(gt.winning_amount) FROM game_txns gt WHERE gt.platform=gpp.platform_code AND DATE_FORMAT(gt.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')>=#{dto.beginTime} AND DATE_FORMAT(gt.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')<=#{dto.endTime} ) as winningAmount, (SELECT SUM(gt.winning_amount)*-1 FROM game_txns gt WHERE gt.platform=gpp.platform_code AND DATE_FORMAT(gt.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')>=#{dto.beginTime} AND DATE_FORMAT(gt.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')<=#{dto.endTime} ) as companyProfit FROM game_parent_platform gpp LEFT JOIN game_platform gp on gp.platform_code=gpp.platform_code LEFT JOIN game_category gc on gc.id=gp.category_id
